text.p: Healthsource Inc said Thursday Charles Schneider, Healthsource's executive vice president, will replace Sally Crawford as chief operating officer.
Crawford will resign from her post as chief operating officer effective January 1, and will continue to assist the company in a consultative capacity, Healthsource said.
Joseph Zubretsky, Healthsource's chief financial officer, also will increase his responsibilities to include information systems, underwriting and other corporate functions.
Healthsource provide managed health care services to more than three million members.
